lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student at boarding school in the north east of America. The school emphasizes service, but because I'm so busy at school I don't have much time to travel or partake in community service. Thanks to Kiva though, I can easily make a difference right from school.

lenders.name: Lindsey

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: Stevia is both the cure for the human body, as well as cold fission.  Stevia blended in water splits it apart into a natural gas, then cycles back to water underneath once hidden toxins that float for easy removal.
lenders.occupational_info: Stevia blends toxic soap out of water, creating what I call pure h2o.  Pure h2o has made my body run faster than most black pro athletes in American football, and lean and ripped with little to no fat on my body.

lenders.name: Russell
lenders.loan_because: It is a great way to help small businesses grow and hopefully prosper with very little downside exposure on my part.

lenders.occupational_info: I am a registered nurse in the Emergency Room

lenders.name: David

lenders.name: Jim & Joyce

lenders.occupational_info: I work for an architectural firm that focuses on designing and creating buildings that are good for the environment!

I also take care of my husband, my father and mother, and my garden, and I am a mother and grandmother.

lenders.name: Doug MacNeil
lenders.loan_because:
I grew up in the town that is the home of the Coady Institute (http://www.coady.stfx.ca/).

lenders.name: Capt!n Ken
lenders.loan_because:
Kiva's mission melds perfectly with Schumacher's ("Small Is Beautiful") concept of village-based economics (Buddhist Economics), a concept that appeals to me.  It is the socially-minded, right-thinking, pragmatic thing to do. And surprisingly, it is also the environmentally right thing to do: you are not providing tractors when hand tools will do; you are not providing help that requires an environmentally violent, destructive and costly infrastructure to support.

Kiva works at the right scale - the human scale.  I want to be part of the "pay it forward” consciousness.  It is just a small contribution towards making this a better world to live in.

lenders.name: Harmen Jan
lenders.loan_because:
I'm so incredible blessed, that i just want to be a blessing!

lenders.loan_because: i want to start my own business to sustian me.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: we are all in this thing together

I decided to get my 2 nieces involved in the selection process to inspire them just as Dave has inspired his children, his family and all the people he came in contact with.

lenders.loan_because: To do some good while we're here.

lenders.name: Erica
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: I have been witness to poverty, civil war and destruction.  I have seen bright smiles on small faces even in the midst of deplorable conditions.  I have also been witness to generosity and the impact it has upon the human spirit.  I loan because it is easy and it can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: At a cross roads in my life - living in the mystery and ready to make some big changes.  As a poet and artist at heart,  life is my canvas.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: people need help and I can do something about it.

lenders.name: Gregory
lenders.loan_because: I want to share my good fortune with those willing to work to better themselves
lenders.occupational_info: I teach middle school mathematics to 8th grade students at a public school.

lenders.name: Gretel
lenders.loan_because: i'm hopeful
lenders.occupational_info: i help disabled kids and the mentally ill keep their legal rights

lenders.name: alice
lenders.loan_because: there is no reason not to.

lenders.name: Claire
lenders.loan_because: This is my way of giving back.  I started my own business and all these people need so little to do the same thing.  It will make such a difference in their lives.

lenders.name: Garrison
lenders.loan_because: in the world that we live in today, it is not enough to simply look after yourself or your country.  If someone asks for help and I have the ability to help them, I will, no matter where in the world they are.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student at California State University, Chico.  I am studying theater and hope to become a professional actor some day.  I am currently studying the techniques of Augusto Boal who uses theater as a means to help the oppressed peoples of the world.

lenders.name: JPFnewyork
lenders.loan_because:
its the right thing to do. I have been blessed
and giving back is part of the rent you pay to be
on this earth.

lenders.name: Jerry
lenders.occupational_info: I teach at an International school.

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because:
When you help others, you can't help helping yourself.
Love all, Serve all

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I believe in making the world a better place!
lenders.occupational_info:
"Truly I tell you, whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers and sisters of mine, you did unto Me."  

Matthew 25:40

lenders.name: Kazuki
lenders.loan_because: I believe this is the one of the best way to change the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Research & Development in image processing and recognition area

lenders.name: Mynaziq
lenders.loan_because: We believe microcredit is a great tool to help people out of poverty
lenders.occupational_info: I sell food!!!!!! n my wife is a full time student

lenders.name: Ella
lenders.loan_because: it is a way of helping people shape their own future.

lenders.name: Nathanael
lenders.loan_because:
I'm able to help, because I have a good-paying steady job and more money than I need to sustain a good and happy life and therefore I have a responsibility to share that surplus which I do not need with my neighbours in less fortunate circumstances.

I also think Kiva is great concept; I donate to local and international aid agencies who help people in need with medicines, accommodation and such but there's more to life than just having somewhere to sleep and something to eat - and I think Kiva and their partner agencies helps people and particularly entrepreneurs realise their dreams and achieving something in building better lives for themselves and their community at a level above just basic needs.

lenders.name: Dietmar
lenders.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurship, and In Private Loans with low interests.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am an Entrepreneur now working in the Internet Industry. Project development and Online Marketing.
I am always here to help, young , talented and hardworking people.

lenders.name: Wilton
lenders.loan_because: I would like to give people a chance to create a better life for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Just chillin'

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I would like to be helpful to those who need just a little extra assistance to get to where they want to go.  It is a small role that we lenders play, as the entrepreneurs are doing all the hard work.  I admire them.
lenders.occupational_info: I represent the United States overseas, and I like to make positive connections between my country and others around the world.  Although lending via Kiva is not related to my work, it is done in the same hopeful spirit.

lenders.name: MICHAEL
lenders.loan_because: I have traveled the world, am currently working in Africa and Europe, have been a war correspondent in Bosnia and the Middle East.  I have seen what a small investment can do to enhance the growth of an individual.
lenders.occupational_info: My company provides architectural design and engineering services around the world.  Personally, I handle the business affairs and keep the company moving forward.

lenders.name: Henk Buis
lenders.loan_because: I have a lot of respect, for the fact, that people want to better their life, for themselves and their families. I wish them the best of luck with their endevours :-)
lenders.occupational_info: Designing for web and print almost 15 years now.

lenders.name: Warren
lenders.loan_because: I think this a wonderful idea and is what life is about (helping people).
lenders.occupational_info: It's just work at this point. Eventually I hope to do my own thing and be financially free. Don't we all want to be???

lenders.name: Cloudia
lenders.loan_because:
"I want to live, I want to grow,
I want to see, I want to know,
I want to share what I can give,
I want to be, I want to live"
 ~ John Denver

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I have had more opportunities than anyone should reasonably expect. I believe that I should help those who have not had as many.

lenders.name: Hugh
lenders.loan_because: In my travels around the world I have come to see how fortunate some of us truly are. I want to give back some of the opportunities I have received. I'm just glad I can do this.
lenders.occupational_info: I travel to various locations to monitor aircraft maintenance

lenders.name: Magnus
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a great way of helping people.

lenders.name: Nancy
Cynthia
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a way to empower people rather than cause dependence
lenders.occupational_info: I work with youth in jail. The youth have done bad crimes but considering their situations they have survived. I hope to break the cycle.

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: Giving inspires hope.
lenders.occupational_info: I train surgeons to use specialized surgical instruments.

lenders.name: Megan and Ben

~Edmund Burke

lenders.name: Brianna
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others by sharing what God has given me. :-)

lenders.name: Radhika
lenders.loan_because: It's such a privilege and because we are all one :)

lenders.loan_because: I want to help others get their start to return the kindness of those who helped me.
lenders.occupational_info: Build buildings for ourselves and others

lenders.loan_because: I am a human being.

lenders.loan_because: we are all one.

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Kathy & Jeff
lenders.loan_because: There are so many people who are working so hard just to get by.  I think it's the least I can do!
lenders.occupational_info: Kathy is a nurse who works in a hospital, implementing new computer systems.  Jeff is recently retired.

lenders.name: maddy
lenders.loan_because: I loan because my sisters godmother gave both me and my sister a gift certificate for kiva. It is fun and exciting to led and the best part is that you know that you are helping people all around the world!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student who lives in calgary. I am in grade 5 and i am having lots of fun learning all of the different subjects.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy creating opportunity and increasing goodwill. I also like watching my loans get repaid so I can make that capital available for another entrepreneur. Thank you Kiva for making this so fun and easy!

lenders.name: Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Sandra & Chuck
lenders.loan_because: It's fun to follow our loans and help people at the same time.

lenders.loan_because: It feels wonderful to make a positive difference in the lives of others.  I would HIGHLY encourage others to get involved in Kiva. Don't just talk about it, please get involved and grow the movement.  Make a positive difference in a Kiva entrepreneur's life today!  :-)

lenders.name: Knut & Eirik
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people to make their own business

lenders.name: Denise
lenders.loan_because: I was given the opportunity from a birthday gift certificate here.  But I think it's a wonderful idea, and I love idea of helping someone that really needs help.

lenders.name: martha
lenders.loan_because: to assist others in need.

lenders.name: Carrie
lenders.loan_because: in honor of my grandmother who passed away.
lenders.occupational_info: teaching children

lenders.occupational_info: I help workers.

lenders.name: Heidi
lenders.loan_because: it gives me a chance to help others help themselves. I also know where all my money goes, and they get 100%. Then when the loan is repaid i get to give someoe else a chance at a real future.
lenders.occupational_info: I look over mortgage loan files for fraud. Then if i don't find any i submit to a lender in hope they will lend my client money on a house.

lenders.name: Bran Schelin
lenders.loan_because:
I've been afforded many an opportunity in my life.

lenders.name: Russell and Catharine

lenders.occupation: High School English Teacher - Gwangju, South Korea
lenders.loan_because: I can help. Also, I'm on a bit of a bucket list-esque mission to contribute to people in all 73 countries of Kiva's lending portfolio. As of Oct. 2013: 60/73
lenders.occupational_info:
more than you're asking for at http://bio.AdamGreenberg.com
AdamGreenberg@AmeriCorpsAlums.org

lenders.name: Nathalie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who were born less fortunate to improve their life circumstances.
lenders.occupational_info: Creating connection, that's my passion! Between organizations and purposes, management and staff, senders and receivers, reason and emotion. I have over 10 years experience in comprehensive customer and stakeholder engagement and master the subtleties of traditional, social and cross-media. For Power2Improve I provide workshops, training and advice on marketing, communications, public relations, social media, journalistic writing, personal branding and leadership skills. Stimulating and inspiring to excel, challenging to be authentic. In short: humanizing business, helping to connect!

lenders.loan_because: I want to help people.

lenders.occupational_info: I teach at a university and I am interested in social entrepreneurship.

It makes me feel more connected to the world around me.

lenders.occupational_info: There's the work I do to earn a living and there is work I do to make the planet a better place to live. My husband and I are on a mission to be good citizens of the world, and to connect to nature by being good to our bodies.
